titles.title: VOTE Resolution
Vote Overtime Tarnishes Everyone Resolution
VOTE Resolution
Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish a maximum time for certain record votes and quorum calls.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary:
Vote Overtime Tarnishes Everyone Resolution or the VOTE Resolution
This resolution amends the House rules to cap the time permitted for a record vote or quorum call at twice the time directed by the Speaker of the House for that record vote or quorum call.
